title: Huge FPS Issue
body:
I have a superclocked 980Ti, and I usually run LoL at up to 300 FPS in teamfights (I have it capped to 144 with my refresh rate). Today, I got into an LoL game, and my FPS was capped at 52, and I had screen tearing in the upper portion of my screen...I closed LoL and went into Overwatch, and ran Overwatch on Epic settings at 144 FPS no problem. 


I ran the LoL repair client, and I still have the issue, what is the problem?

replies.body:
I've seen a number of players reporting this issue with Windows 10. It seems the common solution is to disable the Game bar or turn off Game DVR in your Xbox app. [This guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) will assist you in doing so.

Let me know if you notice any change after taking those steps.

I was hoping this would help, but unfortunately it doesn't work for me.

I have also tried all the steps in FPS Troubleshooting guide, but so far none of them have worked. I have tried turning Virtual Refresh/Sync on and off to no avail. Nothing stops the random (and now more frequent) FPS drops. My ping does not shoot up at all, but when I check my Network Logs for the affected matches, all of them reference the phrase "Network Thread stall" quite a few times. The first major occurrence of this is right around the 6th, so 3 days ago. I have done nothing else to my computer in the meantime. I've tried System Restore, reinstalling and repairing League, resetting my router, updating my graphics driver, updating my network drivers. NOTHING works.

It just so happens that searching "network thread stall" in search engines gives results on the old League of Legends forums from 3-4 years ago, all with no solutions.

I recommend reaching out to our tech team for further assistance since you've seen no change after following our FPS guide. Run a set of logs using [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and attach them to your [ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in order to give our specialists the most complete context on your issue.

Let me know if you have any questions.
